property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. You may discard that token to search your Bureau deck for an Equipment card with the MYSTIC Keyword. Add it to your hand, then reshuffle your Bureau deck.

property.name: Bio
property.value: hester Desmond was an FBI Special Agent and founding member of the Blue Rose Task Force. He investigated Teresa Banks' murder and mysteriously disappeared after finding a ring under a trailer, leading Dale Cooper to take over the case.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card on an Agent controlled by the Active Player during a Site skill check. Until end of turn, that Agent cannot use their base skills for the check. Instead, use the base skills of any one of your Agents (your choice). If none of your Agents have that skill, the skill value is zero.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "How's Annie? How's Annie? How's Annie?" - Mr. C

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place three tokens on Agent Dale Cooper. Once per turn, during a skill check, you may remove one token to add +1 to Agent Cooper's OBSERVATION, OCCULT INVESTIGATION, or SUBTERFUGE skill.

property.name: Bio
property.value: FBI profiler with uncanny intuition and dream-guided insights. Obsessed with coffee, truth, and inner balance, Cooper relies on sharp observational skills to uncover hidden clues, interpreting them through instinct, symbolism, and dreams. A brilliant mind navigating the unknown with calm precision.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on Phillip Jeffries. Once per turn, during the Briefing phase, you may discard one token to double the RES value of any Agent in play (not in the Hospital). Add the additional RES to your Resource Pool.

property.name: Bio
property.value: FBI agent and Blue Rose director, Jeffries vanished in Buenos Aires. Obsessed with ‘Judy' and dark forces, he reappeared briefly before transforming into a non-corporeal, time-bending entity operating from a hidden location known as the Dutchman's.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place one token on this card. Discard one token to choose one Agent controlled by an opponent. Add that Agent to Hardy's Team during one Site investigation. Afterward, return the Agent to the Team it belonged or to the Hospital if the Agent was reduced to 0 HEALTH during combat.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Roger Hardy was an FBI Internal Affairs agent who temporarily suspended Dale Cooper due to concerns about his actions in Canada. He questioned Cooper's conduct, requested his badge and gun, and informed him that the DEA and Canadian authorities would proceed.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If Agent Sam Stanley is in the same Team as Agent Chester Desmond, they both gain a +1 to their cumulative MEDICAL skill, and a -1 to their OBSERVATION skill..

property.name: Bio
property.value: Sam Stanley, an FBI forensic pathologist, assisted Agent Chester Desmond in investigating Teresa Banks' murder. He discovered a key clue under her fingernail and transported the body to Portland. After Desmond's disappearance, Stanley suffered a personal breakdown.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Agent Tammy Preston's BUREAUCRACY and OCCULT INVESTIGATION skills are increased by one if she and Deputy Director Gordon Cole are on the same Team.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Tamara "Tammy" Preston is a brilliant FBI agent recruited into the Blue Rose Task Force. She investigated Agent Dale Cooper's return, analyzed paranormal dossiers, and uncovered timeline anomalies. Her sharp insight and loyalty to Gordon Cole defined her pivotal role in Twin Peaks.

property.name: Episode
property.value: Zen, or the Skill to Catch a Killer

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose any one Agent in play. That Agent cannot be targeted by Event nor Bluff cards this turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Agent Cooper loves coffee. But agent Cooper loves his coffee black." - Norma

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card in your opponent's Field. Your opponent must pay one additional [RP] for each Site card they play.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not initiate combat now. Attach Bob to any one Agent in the Team at this Site (your choice). Place both cards next to your X-File. On your next turn as Directed player after your opponent plays their next Site card, that Agent must attack any one of your opponent's Teams in the Field, ignoring Activator requirements. Remove Bob and return the Agent to your opponent's Field after the combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Maybe that's all Bob is. The evil that men do." - Albert Rosenfield

card.name: Buckhorn Police Dept., Buckhorn, South Dakota

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We don't know whose body that is. Nothing's come back on those prints. But there's another set of prints all over the apartment." - Constance Talbot

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per turn, during the Case Assignment Phase, if the Agent equipped with this card is in the Bureau, you may pay 2 [RP] tokens to draw the top two cards of your Bureau deck and add them to your hand.

card.name: Calhoun Memorial Hospital, Twin Peaks, WA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Ring finger, under the nail. Let's see what he left us. It's an 'R.'" - Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds two to the Agent's OBSERVATION and SUBTERFUGE skills. You cannot sell this card during the Briefing phase to gain [CP] points

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Then a descent to a cool, subterranean cave may be just what the doctor ordered." - Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team in the Field during the Investigation Phase. If the Team makes a CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION 6+ skill check, reveal all face-down Bluff cards attached to any one Site in the Field.

property.name: Episode
property.value: Zen, or the Skill to Catch a Killer

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to add 7 [CP] to your [CP] pool immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Catch you with my dead bag. You may think that I've gone insane... but I promise, I will kill again." - Bob

card.name: Deer Meadow Sheriff's Department Morgue, OR

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one METHOD question. If you ask if the METHOD is "Violence", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Teresa Banks lived at the Canyon Trailer Park or a month. We'll check that. And worked as a waitress at the Hap's Truck Stop. Worked the Night Shift. Good place for dinner when we were thru here, Sam." - Agent Desmond

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this Witness to a Team. This Witness will add his skills to the appropriate skill check like an Agent, CRC: 3, LRC: 3, and HEALTH: 3. If he is sent to the Hospital, or at any time there are no Agents in the Team, remove the card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Harry, Hawk here. The trout’s heading upstream towards the net." - Hawk

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place 1 [RP] on this card. This may be used to pay for any Keyword BUREAUCRACY, LIMINAL or OCCULT INVESTIGATION cards. If you use this [RP], replace it during your Briefing Phase.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Gordon Cole is a veteran FBI agent and head of the Blue Rose Task Force. Known for his sharp instincts and partial deafness, he leads investigations into paranormal phenomena, including the mystery of Dale Cooper's disappearance and return. Loyal and fearless.

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Detective Dave Macklay gains +1 OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill if he is in a Team with an Agent who has the BELIEVER Keyword or OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Detective Dave Macklay investigated Ruth Davenport's murder, linking fingerprints to Bill Hastings. He coordinated with the FBI uncovering connections to alternate dimensions and Major Garland Briggs. Macklay witnessed bizarre phenomena, including Hastings' death, and confirmed the presence of mysterious, shadowy figures nearby.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during a skill check. You may discard two cards from your hand to gain +1 to that skill check, or discard four cards to gain +2 instead. You cannot discard more than four cards this way.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Shelly, you've got your own life to worry about right now. I'll be fine here." - Norma

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If Detective Don Harrison is in the same Team as Detective Dave Macklay, they both gain a +1 to their cumulative COMPUTER and CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skills, and a -1 to their OBSERVATION and SCIENCES skills..

property.name: Bio
property.value: Detective Don Harrison of the South Dakota State Police investigated the mysterious murder of Ruth Davenport. He questioned William Hastings and, alongside Detective Dave Macklay, uncovered a piece of flesh in Hastings' car and a ring hidden inside a decapitated corpse.

card.name: Evil in A Suit and Tie

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card next to your X-File. You may play [CP] Events for one [CP] less. You may only have one of this card in play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I've got the cure for what ails you. It's simple, really. But it always improves my mood." - Leland Palmer

card.name: FBI Chief of Staff Denise Bryson

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on this card. Discard a token to move Agent Dale Cooper from anywhere on the table to the Team Denise Bryson is in. Cooper may assist in any skill check made by the team. In this manner, Cooper may assist on two Sites in one turn.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Denise Bryson began her career as an undercover DEA agent, working with Dale Cooper on high-risk missions. After embracing her identity as a woman, she rose through the FBI ranks with distinction, eventually becoming Chief of Staff for the Bureau.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Who do you think that is there?" - Phillip Jeffries

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place two tokens on this card. Discard a token to play any Keyword MEDICAL or SCIENCES card for zero cost.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Albert Rosenfield, a brilliant yet cynical FBI forensic specialist, assisted Agent Cooper in the Laura Palmer investigation and later in the Blue Rose case. Despite his sharp tongue, he believed in peace, rejecting violence and embracing love as his guiding principle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card next to your X-File. You may force your opponent to discard one card from their hand (opponent's choice) once per turn during their Healing Phase. You may only have one of this card in your Bureau Deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm supposed to watch the box and see if anything appears inside." - Sam Colby

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: When playing this Site, the Active player may draw one card.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Diane: "Is it you? Is it really you?"Cooper: "Yes. It's really me, Diane"

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds three to the Agent's CLOSE RANGE COMBAT skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Your right hand will then possess the power of an enormous pile driver." - Freddie Sykes

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of this Combat, if Hank's HEALTH has not been reduced to zero, you may play him at another Site controlled by the same opponent this turn at no cost and ignoring Activator requirements. If no such Site exists, discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Oh, Ed, the things we do for love." - Hank Jennings

property.name: Text
property.value: During the LONG RANGE COMBAT round, for every two cards discarded from your hand, increase Hutch & Chantal's LRC by 1.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "That douchebag is really pissing me off!" - Chantal

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card next to your X-File. Remove this card from play at any time to discard all Keyword RESOURCE cards in play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This is the water, and this is the well. Drink full and descend. The horse is the white of the eyes and dark within." - The Woodsman

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to remove one Agent from play until the end of the turn. This card may be played at any time, except during Combat, but it can be used in response to an opponent playing an Adversary card. X is the [CP] cost of that Agent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This would look nice on your wall." - Mrs. Tremond

card.name: Jack Rabbit's Palace, Twin Peaks, WA

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Two hundred and fifty-three yards due east. And we have to put some soil in our pockets." - Hawk

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's EVIDENCE COLLECTION or adds 2 to one Team's SUBTERFUGE skill check. If played on 'One eyed Jacks, Canada' Site, this card costs 1 [RP] less.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Laura, she is all tied up. Oh, she liked that. The bird, he starts pecking on her shoulder." - Jacques Renault

card.name: Jake and Gene, the Snipers Alliance

property.name: Text
property.value: The chosen Agent is the only one who may participate in the Combat. Jake & Gene may use MARTIAL ARTS and SUBTERFUGE cards. Your opponent may pay 4 [RP] to force you to discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Oh my God! Gene, he's not in the car!" - Jake

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL or adds 2 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I think something scared her, because she wouldn't see me. She wouldn't even talked to me." - James Hurley

property.name: Text
property.value: Josie Packard may attack only one Agent (your choice) in one round of LONG RANGE and one CLOSE RANGE COMBAT. All other Agents in the Team also participate in the Combat and may assign damage to Josie as normal.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Why did you shoot me, Josie?" - Cooper

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question or one RESULT question. If you ask if the MOTIVE is "Control", the skill check prerequisite is 4+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "You better hope that you never get involved with someone like him." - Duncan Todd

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds two to the Agent's SCIENCES and CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skills. You cannot sell this card during the Briefing phase to gain [CP] points.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Time of death estimated to be between midnight and four AM. What killed her was loss of blood. Numerous shallow wounds, no single one serious enough to have caused death." - Dr. Hayward

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds two to the Agent's BEHAVIORAL and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills. You cannot sell this card during the Briefing Phase to gain [CP] points.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What we have taped to the page here is a plastic envelope containing a white residue and what looks to be a key to a safety deposit box." - Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's MEDICAL or adds 2 to one Team's OBSERVATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'd like to help you, Agent Cooper. Maybe there is some sort of hula we can do around my doctor-patient confidentiality." - Lawrence Jacoby

property.name: Text
property.value: Leland Palmer's LRC and CRC values are each equal to the number of Agents in the Team currently investigating this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Your hands are filthy... look, there is dirt way under this fingernail." - Leland Palmer

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's BUREAUCRACY or adds 2 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Right, which is probably why Lil was wearing a red wig meaning we are headed into a dangerous situation." - Agent Desmond

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: Place a token on Garland Briggs. If a Team including Briggs is attacked by an Adversary with the OCCULT or PRIMORDIAL Keyword, you may discard one token to have only Briggs engage that Adversary in Combat. After Combat, discard the Adversary card.

property.name: Bio
property.value: Major Garland Briggs was a principled U.S. Air Force officer who oversaw a secret paranormal research site in Twin Peaks. Committed to truth and duty, he aided Agent Cooper against supernatural threats and sacrificed himself battling evil beyond our world.

card.name: May the Giant Be With You

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after asking a Characteristic question about your opponent's X-File and receiving a "No" response. Your opponent must then revel an additional Characteristic from the same category that also does not apply to their X-File (e.g., "The Result is not Death". Remove this card from the game.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "A path is formed by laying one stone at a time." - The Giant

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after your opponent has finished drawing cards in the Briefing Phase. Place this card next to your X-File with two tokens on it. Discard one token to examine your opponent's hand. When there are no tokens left, discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's not a puzzle at all. It's a map." - Andy Brennan

card.name: Mr. C, The Shadow of Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: Select one Agent on target Team and move the Agent to the Hospital with 0 HEALTH. Mr. C's LRC, CRC, and HEALTH values become equal to those of the selected Agent. Mr. C then attacks the remaining Agents on that Team in a normal Combat sequence that lasts one LRC round and one CRC round.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "What brings you back to Twin Peaks, Agent Cooper?" - Sheriff Truman

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Briefing Phase on a Team of Agents in the Field to double the RES produced by each Agent in that Team for this turn. Discard this card afterward.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play any Adversary card from your Discard Pile for 2 [CP] less, ignoring Activator requirements.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Ike, you're under arrest for attempted murder. We have your palm print." - Detectives Fusco

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question. You may draw one card from your Bureau deck if you successfully investigate this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Blackie: "You look like a cop."Cooper: "I'm the cop."

property.name: Text
property.value: You may search your Bureau deck for an Adversary card with a printed cost of six or less, reveal it, and play it immediately at half its cost (rounded up) ignoring Activator requirements. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Oh! and I know you got to die. A royal execution." - Windom Earle

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to negate one card with the Keyword CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or EVIDENCE COLLECTION.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: Cooper:"Did you kill Laura Palmer?".Leland:"Whooo!!! Whoo-whoo! Hoo-hoo-hoo!! Whooo!!! Whooo! Hoo-Hoo!"

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team investigating a Site to make a BEHAVIORAL 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "He's taken another pawn, Harry but he didn't tell us his move. Windom Earle's playing off the board." - Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Team investigating a Site to discard any one [RP] Keyword RESOURCE card controlled by your opponent.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Did you take all of that today?" - Becky Burnett

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach this card to an Agent and immediately remove that Agent from play. At the start of your next Briefing Phase, return the Agent to the Field with this card still attached. While attached, the Agent gains +2 to their OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Don't take the ring, Laura... Don't take the ring." - Cooper

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question. If the answer is 'no', you may return this card to your hand instead of discarding it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 1 to the Agent's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION and EVIDENCE COLLECTION skills

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Voice activated, Harry. When the bird talks maybe we'll get some answers." - Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION or adds 2 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Through the darkness of future past, the magician longs to see, one chants out between two worlds, fire walk with me." - Phillip Gerard

property.name: Episode
property.value: The Path to the Black Lodge

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on one Agent to decrease all their skills by two (except for LRC, CRC, HEALTH and RES) for each [RP] card attached to that Agent. No skill may be reduced below zero. This card is removed once that Agent's Team successfully investigates a Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Major, I admire your fortitude." - Windom Earle

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team investigating a Site to make a COMPUTER 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "The cow jumped over the moon." - Mr. C

card.name: Señorita Dido, A light in the Darkness

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card immediately after all Agents in one of your Teams at a Site have been sent to the Hospital. Return the Site card to your hand. Each Agent in that Team immediately heals 1 point of damage.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Remember 430. Richard and Linda. Two birds with one stone." - The Giant

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card next to your X-File with three damage tokens on it. Once per turn, during the Healing Phase, you may move one damage token to any one of your opponent’s Agents (your choice). The same Agent may not be damaged on consecutive turns.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "He moved! I saw him move! No. It's too creepy. It's wrong, Bobby." - Shelly Johnson

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card next to your X-File with two tokens on it. Discard a token to apply a -2 modifier to any Agent's Skill Check. You may do this once per turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm in the sheriff's station... because... because... I'm not me." - Diane's Tulpa

property.name: Text
property.value: Play 3 [CP] to move up to 4 [RP] from your opponent's [RP] pool to your [CP] pool immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Did you ever see anything like this? This is what I want." - Mr. C

property.name: Game Effect
property.value: If you successfully investigate this Site, you may force an opponent to discard one card from the top of their Bureau Deck.

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one MOTIVE question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm not gonna talk about Judy." - Agent Phillip Jeffries

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play Keyword BLUFF cards for 1 [CP] less. If placed face down under a Site (as usual), the cost is reduced by 1 more [CP] for a total of 2 [CP] less. A Bluff could be played this way for free, but you can never gain tokens by playing a Bluff card. Your opponent may pay 6 [RP] to force you to discard this card.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "It's a goddamn bad story, isn't it, Hawk?." - Sarah Palmer

property.name: Text
property.value: The Experiment engages two opposing Agents (your choice) in Combat.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "I'm supposed to watch the box and see if anything appears inside." - Sam Colby

property.name: Episode
property.value: The Path to the Black Lodge

property.name: Text
property.value: Force an opponent Team investigating a Site to make a OCCULT INVESTIGATION 4+ skill check or the current player's turn ends immediately.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "When Jupiter and Saturn meet, Oh, what a crop of mummy wheat." - Windom Earle

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card next to your X-File with three tokens on it. Discard a token to apply a +1 modifier to any one Agent's Skill check. You may do this once per turn.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Come on then. My log does not judge." - Log Lady

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card during the Briefing Phase. Discard a Keyword CONSPIRACY card from your hand with a cost of 7 [CP] or less to gain a number of [RP] tokens equal to that card's cost.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "When you see me again it won't be me." - The Arm

card.name: The Plan Must Be Carried Out

property.name: Text
property.value: Place this card next to your X-File. You may play [RP] Events for one [RP] less. You may only have one of this card in play.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "This is it, Jackrabbit's Palace!" - Bobby Briggs

property.name: Text
property.value: Play this card to look at the top six cards of your opponent's Bureau deck. Choose and discard three of them, then return the rest to the top of their deck in any order.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Do you know what the ultimate secret is? Do you want to know... what Laura did?" - Harold Smith

card.name: The Woodsmen, Sentinels of the Black Lodge

property.name: Text
property.value: The LONG RANGE COMBAT round is skipped. At the beginning of each combat round you may discard 2 [CP] from your [CP] pool to heal 1 point of damage to the Woodsmen (only 1 damage token can be removed this way each round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on any Team investigating a Site. Only Agents with a base value of 5 or more [RP] may contribute to that Site skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "If you know what's good for you, and you do, don't move." - Bob

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one AFFILIATION question or one RESULT question.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Diane, 11:30 a.m., February 24th. Entering the town of Twin Peaks. It's five miles south of the Canadian border, twelve miles west of the state line." - Cooper

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION or adds 2 to one Team's BEHAVIORAL skill check. If played after Adversary card 'Leland Palmer' attacked a Team, the cost of this card is halved.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "...hurting me, stop it, Leo, no..." - Waldo

property.name: Text
property.value: Adds 3 to one Team's SUBTERFUGE or adds 2 to one Team's OCCULT INVESTIGATION skill check.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "We gave him the numbers. And he started to float up... and he said some words. 'Cooper, Cooper.' Right before his head disappeared." - William Hastings

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to change the Site Prerequisite to Sciences 3+.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Lesions on wrists, ankles and upper arms, where she was bound. We're waiting on toxological tests for drug use." - Dr. William Hayward

card.name: Windom Earle, Seeker of the Black Lodge

property.name: Text
property.value: If this Adversary's HEALTH is reduced to 0 during Combat, you may immediately play an Adversary card with a cost less than 5 from your discard pile, ignoring Activator requirements, at its normal cost. That Adversary immediately begins a normal Combat with the Team.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "If you give me your soul, I'll let Annie live." - Windom Earle

property.name: Question
property.value: You may ask one METHOD question or one RESULT question. Add 2 [RP] to your [RP] pool if you successfully investigate this Site.

property.name: Dialogue
property.value: "Now that everyone is here, I will make my phone call. Now, who should I call? Should I call Mr. Strawberry?" - Mr. C
